testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlHARPriorityQueueRequest dialog as an EC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.6.7.6 [Need to View HAR Message Queue] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.7.2.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N66R435_Restrictions_Supported = ${TMDD_N66R435_Restrictions_Supported}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Operator Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.7.2.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N66R436_Operator_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N66R436_Operator_Identifier_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Unique Sequence Number is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.7.2.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N66R437_Unique_Sequence_Number_Supported = ${TMDD_N66R437_Unique_Sequence_Number_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.7.2.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N66R438_Event_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N66R438_Event_Identifier_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Response Plan Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.7.2.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N66R439_Event_Response_Plan_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N66R439_Event_Response_Plan_Identifier_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Request Expiration Date and Time is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.7.2.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N66R440_Request_Expiration_Date_and_Time_Supported = ${TMDD_N66R440_Request_Expiration_Date_and_Time_Supported}
Step 8 CONFIGURE: Define the response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: ResponseMessage: ${ResponseMessage}
Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 10 CONFIGURE: Identify the Username expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Username: ${Username}
Step 11 CONFIGURE: Identify the Password expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Password: ${Password}
Step 12 CONFIGURE: Identify the Organization Identifier expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: OrganizationID: ${OrganizationID}
Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 15 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}
Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT is expected to have valid data available for a response message in this test. RECORD this information as: DataValid: ${DataValid}

Step 17 REQUEST-RESPONSE-OC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlHARPriorityQueueRequest AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck USERNAME = Username PASSWORD = Password ORGANIZATIONID = OrganizationID ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected DATAVALID = DataValid
Step 18 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.1 IF TMDD_N66R435_Restrictions_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.2 IF TMDD_N66R436_Operator_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.2.1 VERIFY that element operator-id exists within each instance of devicePriorityQueueRequestMsg.authentication
Step 18.3 IF TMDD_N66R437_Unique_Sequence_Number_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.4 IF TMDD_N66R438_Event_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.5 IF TMDD_N66R439_Event_Response_Plan_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.6 IF TMDD_N66R440_Request_Expiration_Date_and_Time_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.7 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 18.8 CONFIGURE: Set OptionalContentVerified to True
Step 18.9 POSTCONDITION: REQUEST-RESPONSE-OC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlHARPriorityQueueRequest OPTIONALCONTENTVERIFIED = OptionalContentVerified RESPONSEMESSAGE = ResponseMessage
